entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Terra Nova National Park 11:30 PM NST Friday 03 February 2023

Pressure / Tendency: 97.7 kPa rising
Humidity: 92 %

entry.title: Friday night: Snow mixed with rain. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Snow ending late this evening then partly cloudy. Snow mixed with rain this evening. 40 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow early this evening. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 near midnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries or snow squalls. Temperature steady near minus 16.
entry.summary: Flurries and snow squalls. Blowing snow in the afternoon. Local amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 80 near noon. Temperature steady near minus 16. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 11 by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Clearing before morning. Blowing snow. Wind southwest 60 km/h gusting to 80 becoming northwest 50 gusting to 70 overnight. Temperature rising to minus 11 by morning. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 03 February 2023
